name: Volcano Cake
effect:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 900â€“1,500 HP.
description: A volcano-shaped cake. The ingredients were mixed together, stirred into a thick paste, then poured into a mold for baking. Timing it to perfection allows the outer layer to solidify while the filling remains soft and gooey, just like a real volcano.

suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.
suspicious.description: A volcano-shaped cake. The "mountain" has failed to fully contain the "lava" within, resulting in a collapse that genuinely resembles a volcanic eruption, bringing calamity to the tray beneath. Looks like some cleanup is in order before the next try...

normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.
normal.description: A volcano-shaped cake. The ingredients were mixed together, stirred into a thick paste, then poured into a mold for baking. Timing it to perfection allows the outer layer to solidify while the filling remains soft and gooey, just like a real volcano.

delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.
delicious.description: A volcano-shaped cake. The steaming hot "little volcano" finds its perfect foil in the icy-cool "ash cloud" that rises above. Aside from its irresistible sweetness, the aroma of the flowing "lava" brings you a deep sense of satisfaction and comfort.
